amendment.description: To make certain conforming and technical amendments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4045 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4045 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10922; text: CR S10922) To make certain conforming and technical amendments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4045 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 3981.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4045 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
